price: 73. Mpe bazali kobimisa kati na yango (biloko) oyo ezali kosalisa bango, mpe misusu ya komela kasi bazali kotondo te?
arabic: وَلَهُمۡ فِيهَا مَنَٰفِعُ وَمَشَارِبُۚ أَفَلَا يَشۡكُرُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: walahum fīhā manāfiʿu wamashāribu afalā yashkurūna
